title: Holy Hell (cult doc)
description:
Tig and Cheryl reach nirvana as they discuss the cult doc "Holy Hell," which features surprisingly candid interviews with past members of the Buddhafield cult. Plus, Cheryl foresees a future career as a psychic, and Tig tells a story about a TV appearance gone wrong! *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
